body:
Current xSDK users do not use the Tpetra stack of Trilinos.
Because it takes so long to build, I disabled it several months
ago.  This commit provides the option to reenable it with the
+tpetra option.  The +tpetra option enables the entire tpetra
stack, including amesos2 and xsdktrilinos.
title: Added Tpetra option to xsdk package
